=Configuration Options Reference=

Options are specified in the configuration file using
`$config[$name] = $value;`

===Database Access===

|| Name || Required || Default || Description ||
|| *db_host* || True || localhost || The database server hostname or IP ||
|| *db_user* || True || || The database username ||
|| *db_pass* || True || || The database password ||
|| *db_name* || True || || The database name to use ||
